channel.title: Wayland only or Noland
channel.description:
There shouldnt be x11/xorg nor xwayland, either wayland or no land.
Otherwise we gonna face the loop of legacy and [unwanted vulnerabilities](https://www.gamingonlinux.com/2025/06/multiple-security-issues-in-the-x-org-x-server-and-xwayland-disclosed-new-versions-released/).

item.title: Wayland only or Noland

There shouldnt be x11/xorg nor xwayland, either wayland or no land.

Otherwise we gonna face the loop of legacy and unwanted vulnerabilities.
